mapper.sql: id, uuid, code, student_code, lesson_code, score, content, create_user, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS create_time, update_user, DATE_FORMAT( update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_lesson_evaluate
uuid, code, student_code, lesson_code, score, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, content,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lessonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_lesson_evaluate
student_code = #{studentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lesson_code = #{lessonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where `code` = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
